Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the infill housing pilot program in the city of Buffalo
Summary: Establishes the infill housing pilot program in the city of Buffalo which shall provide capital subsidies for the purpose of building two thousand one- to two- family housing units.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1300 & 1301, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing the infill housing pilot program in the city of Buffalo
